Verse:
Having relied on the collected records and oral transmission, I briefly record the records of the responses of the Three Jewels.
Even those who see, hear, praise, or slander will receive the same benefits and be born in the Pure Land.
In the Dharma-ending age of Shakyamuni Tathagata, if one hears the Three Jewels and gives rise to a little faith,
The karmic hindrances of the three periods of time will be completely eliminated, and one will definitely see the holy assembly in the next life.
I vow to dedicate the merits and virtues of recording the responses to all sentient beings in the Dharma realm.
May they attain excellent rebirths, increase their blessings and wisdom, and together realize the vast and great supreme enlightenment.
The brief record of the responses of the Three Jewels is completed.
